name: Candy Bubble Christmas for Free Games 2017
name_original: Candy Bubble Christmas for Free Games 2017
description:
Candy puzzle match 3 for Christmas is coming now!
Use your way through over 160 addictive puzzles! Collect candy as more as possible! Join the sweetest journey now!

Features:
1. A fresh gameplay of matching puzzle game, challenging and delicious
2. Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
3. Time limits or Moves limits mode
4. Over 160 well-designed free levels
5. Leaderboard to watch your friends and competitors!
6. Magic Boosts: Bomb Candies, Chocolate Candies,ice, and many other interesting in-game items
7. Easy to learn, challenging to master.

How to Play
1. Match candies as many as you can to get higher score in group 3 or more.
2. Collect a certain number of target fruits or bricks to pass the level in the limited moves or time.
